page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RUTH.
page.content: After lunch I take Harry the hamster out of his cage and feed and clean him. Then I play out on the yard for half an hour. Lunchtime ends at 1.20. In the afternoon I normally do work on our novel. This term we are studying "Danny the champion of the world" by Roald Dahl. This work often takes all afternoon. When I get home at 4 o'clock I watch television and have tea. I go upstairs and get ready for Brownies. This starts at 5.30 and finishes at 7p.m. I go by car. when I get home from Brownies I get ready for bed. My mum comes into my bedroom and we talk about the day for ten minutes and then I go to sleep.
